mapper.sql: ID, LAST_DATE, CUR_DATE, NEXT_DATE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into T_WORK (ID, LAST_DATE, CUR_DATE, NEXT_DATE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{curDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nextDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

ID,

mapper.update:
update T_WORK
LAST_DATE = #{lastDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
CUR_DATE = #{curDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
NEXT_DATE = #{nextDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_WORK set LAST_DATE = #{lastDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, CUR_DATE = #{curDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, NEXT_DATE = #{nextDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
